item.title: C++ Global _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
item.description: I became extremely annoyed by thousands of these messages while running MSBuild: c:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 10.0\VC\include\string.h(105) : see declaration of 'strcpy' SomeFile.

item.title: My Review of Inside the MicrosoftÂ® Build Engine
item.description: Originally submitted at O’Reilly <div> <img src="https://images.powerreviews.com/images_products/10/17/11015158_100.jpg" class="photo" align="left" style="margin: 0 0.5em 0 0" /></p> <p style="margin-top:0"> <p> Your practical guide to using, customizing, and extending the build engine in Visual Studio 2010.
